title: Nocturnall lucubrations: or Meditations divine and morall Whereunto are added epigrams and epitaphs: written by Rob: Chamberlain of Exeter Colledge in Oxford.
author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.
publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Daniel Frere, at the signe of the Red Bull in Little-Brittaine,
